example.code:
PS C:\>$params = @{ Name="example.com" CallerReference="myUniqueIdentifier" HostedZoneConfig_Comment="This is my first hosted zone" DelegationSetId="NZ8X2CISAMPLE" }
PS C:\>New-R53HostedZone @params
example.description: Creates a new hosted zone named 'example.com', associated with a reusable delegation set. This example uses splatting to supply the parameters to the cmdlet.
